trans-unit.source: Represents an item (row) in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje element (wiersz) w <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: A DataGridItem object represents an item (row) in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data row.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt DataGridItem reprezentuje element (wiersz) w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli, takie jak sekcji nagłówka, stopki lub wierszem danych.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The data items of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Elementy danych <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>formantu są przechowywane w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>kolekcji, który jest możliwy za pomocą <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A>Właściwość <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You can use a DataGridItem object to programmatically access the properties of an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt DataGridItem służy do uzyskania programowego dostępu do właściwości elementu w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Ten konstruktor umożliwia tworzenie i inicjuje nowe wystąpienie <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>klasy.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Indeks elementu z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>kolekcji w <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The index number of the item, from the bound data source, that appears in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Numer indeksu elementu ze źródła danych powiązania, który jest wyświetlany w <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Jeden z <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> wartości.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data item represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia dane elementu reprezentowanego przez <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> obiektu w <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to specify or determine the properties of a data item represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Użyj właściwości elementu danych do określania właściwości danych elementu reprezentowanego przez <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>obiektu w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ta właściwość ma zastosowanie tylko do elementów danych w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>Musi mieć ustawioną właściwość `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, lub `ListItemType.EditItem`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> reprezentujący element danych w <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object from the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera indeks <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> obiektów ze źródła danych powiązania.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSetIndex property to get the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać indeks, użyj właściwości DataSetIndex <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>obiektów ze źródła danych powiązania.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ta właściwość ma zastosowanie tylko do elementów danych w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>Właściwość <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>obiektu musi być ustawiona na `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, lub `ListItemType.EditItem`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Indeks <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> ze źródła danych powiązania.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera indeks <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> obiekt z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>Kolekcja <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Użyj właściwości ItemIndex do określenia indeksu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>obiekt z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A>Kolekcja <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ta właściwość ma zastosowanie tylko do elementów danych w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>Właściwość <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>obiektu musi być ustawiona na `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, lub `ListItemType.EditItem`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Indeks <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>Kolekcja <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the item represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera typ elementu reprezentowanego przez <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> obiektu w <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemType property to determine the type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Umożliwia określenie typu elementu w właściwość ItemType <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the various item types.
trans-unit.target: W poniższej tabeli wymieniono różne typy elementów.

trans-unit.source: |Item Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Header`|The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Footer`|The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Item`|An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`AlternatingItem`|An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`SelectedItem`|The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`EditItem`|The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Separator`|A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Pager`|The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.|
trans-unit.target: | Typ elementu | Opis elementu | |---------------|-----------------| | `Header`| Sekcja nagłówka formantu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `Footer`| Stopki formantu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `Item`| Element w kontrolce <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `AlternatingItem`| Przemienne elementu w formancie <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `SelectedItem`| Wybrany element w kontrolce <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `EditItem`| Wybrano elementu do edycji w formancie <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `Separator`| Separatora między elementami formantu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `Pager`| Strona sekcji wyboru <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Jeden z <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> wartości.

trans-unit.source: Used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Używana wewnętrznie przez <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Źródło zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>Obiekt, który zawiera dane zdarzenia.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli zdarzenie zostało anulowane; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Używana wewnętrznie przez <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Jeden z <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> wartości.

trans-unit.target: Można go używać tylko wtedy, gdy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>wystąpienia jest rzutowane na <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>interfejsu.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
